title: Written in the Stars
description: The day thirteen-year-old Sophie Watters went to the Spinners concert was the best day of her life, so far. She had front row tickets to see the totally gorgeous and talented Geoff Mann, the lead singer and love of her life. Not only did she get to see Geoff in concert, but she also got to meet him backstage, and he kissed her on the cheek! At that moment, she knew her mom was rightdreams do come true. But Sophie's fairy-tale life was met by unbelievable tragedy just weeks later. She lost the one person she couldn't live withouther mom. Six years later Sophie is still grieving her mother's death and has long since stopped believing in happy endings and dreaming. She takes a trip to her mother's hometown in Italy for a chance to escape the pain, but her pain only worsens since everything there reminds her of mom. But what Sophie doesn't realize is that her story isn't finished yet, and while she is in Italy, the plot thickens as her childhood dream resurfaces. There she will meet the one person who can fix her broken heart, the one person who can bring her back to life, the only person who can make her whole again, someone completely unexpectedGeoff Mann. But will Sophie allow herself to believe in a happy ending? Can she find the freedom to dream again? And even more, will she realize that she is a dream come true for someone else? Dare to believe that dreams come true as you discover what is Written in the Stars. Jayme Ardente-Silliman lives in Maricopa, Arizona, with her husband and three children. Written in the Stars is her first novel.
author: Jayme Ardente-Silliman
